title: I can't decide if I who I should main!
body: Should I main LeBlanc or Orianna or Vladimir or Twisted Fate for mid lane solo q?

replies.body: Step 1: Find broken champion that riot refuses to nerf because of fanbase (yasuo etc.) Step 2: Get really good at said champion. Step 3: Collect elo.
Yasuo is not broken. Hence why 9/10 Yasuos just feed.
add all of them into your roster, those are all good picks

Vladimir is probably the best choice as a main in the entire game. Playing him will force you to get good mechanically. 

Out of those choices if you are looking for current meta stuff, then Orianna.
my vote went to ori, second pick to her wouldbe viktor
The game got a whole lot more fun to me when my champ pool went from 4 to whoever sounds fun each game in each role.
Don't main LB she is perma ban and about to get nuked by nerf hammer.
Main who you enjoy the most, if you can't figure out which one that is then just play them all.
